newsitem.title: USA: UroHealth sees Q1 revs of $24-26 mln.
newsitem.headline: UroHealth sees Q1 revs of $24-26 mln.

text.p: UroHealth Systems Inc said Tuesday it expects to report revenues in the range of $24 million to $26 million for the first quarter ending June 30.
The company said this revenue level is lower than it previously expected because of slower than expected order flow in the surgical division from recently signed group purchasing agreements.
The company reported a loss for the year ended March 31 of $4.59, after charges, compared with a loss of $2.03 for the same period a year ago.
